source.name: Monsters of Wilderness - Oswald's Curse
source.author: Andrew Cawood
source.description:
Cawood Publishing presents Monsters of the Wilderness: Oswald's Curse for 5th Edition! Includes conversion tables for OSE, DCC, PF1, and PF2. Over 120 new monsters plus resources to run a wilderness campaign. The fourth book in our bestselling Monsters series!
A wizard can change the world for better...or worse.
The legendary wizard Oswald Myrr has unleashed a curse upon the world. Strange new monsters have arrived and other creatures have been transformed. This book includes seven wilderness regions, each with a titan and other monsters. From the Faun of the Dead to the Giant Sand Shark, from Baba Yaga to the People of the Sky!
It's Time to Get Wild!
This 160-page full-color book includes:
• General lore about the wilderness and Oswald's curse • Game Master advice • Adventure hooks • 123 new 5E monsters with individual illustrations, stat blocks, and bios • titans, giants, dragons, undead, humanoids, fey, fiends, elementals, lycanthropes, etc. • 7 different wilderness regions; Ocean, Arctic, Desert, Swamp and Jungle, Forest, Hills and Lakes, Mountain • 7 titans, legendary monsters for each region • 8 wizards including the legendary Oswald Myrr • CRs 1/4 to 26 • Druid and ranger subclasses • NPC encounters, events, locations tables • A map of the World of Myrr
